title: Doctor Who: 365 Days of Memorable Moments and Impossible Things
description: Do you remember the first time you saw the TARDIS? For more than half a century, Doctor Who has entertained and enthralled fans with the time-traveling adventures of the Doctor. From the first glimpse of a police telephone box in a Totter’s Lane junkyard to the fall of the Time Lords’ home planet, Gallifrey, Doctor Who has provided a near-inexhaustible list of indelible memories. Doctor 365 Days of Memorable Moments and Impossible Things is a unique and captivating chronicle of those moments—flashes of drama or humor, terror or joy, for each and every day of the year. Revisiting classic battles, thrilling escapes, iconic characters, game-changing plot twists and more, Justin Richards creates a fascinating portrait of the world’s longest running science fiction series, and an essential addition to any Doctor Who fan’s collection.
author: Justin Richards
